com.agorapulse.permissions

Interface PermissionChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPermissionChecker

    public interface PermissionChecker
    PermissionChecker is the service backing the RequiresPermission annotation and can be used for low-level access. The default implementation uses existin beans of type PermissionAdvisor to evaluate the permissions' conditions.
